price: O humans, you are toiling towards your Lord[4], and you will surely meet Him[5].
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
footnotes:
[4] i.e., striving in doing good or evil until you meet your Lord.
 [5] To be recompensed by Him for your deeds.
